sentences.en: By eight o'clock he had arrived at my hotel.
sentences.cn: 到8点时，他已经到达我住的宾馆了。

sentences.en: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentences.cn: 据我估计我们离梅卡巴堡有七八公里远。

sentences.en: Charlie was earning eight pounds, I was earning five.
sentences.cn: 查利赚了8英镑，我赚了5英镑。

sentences.en: Eight drawings by French artist Jean Cocteau will be auctioned next week.
sentences.cn: 下周法国画家让·科克托的8幅作品将被拍卖。

sentences.en: He also had his licence endorsed with eight penalty points.
sentences.cn: 他的驾驶执照也被扣了8分。

sentences.en: He walked two hundred and sixty miles in eight days.
sentences.cn: 他在8天里走了260英里的路。

sentences.en: Hilton roused him at eight-thirty by rapping on the door.
sentences.cn: 希尔顿8点半敲门把他叫醒了。

sentences.en: It’s only eight days till Christmas.
My fish average 2 lb 8 oz and I've had two eight-pounders.
sentences.cn: 我的鱼平均每条重2磅8盎司，还有过两条重8磅的。

sentences.en: My parents died when I was eight (= eight years old ).
One in eight women lives in an abusive relationship.
sentences.cn: 每八位女性中就有一位遭受伴侣的虐待。

sentences.en: The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
sentences.cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

sentences.en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
sentences.cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

sentences.en: The time delay would be smaller by eight orders of magnitude.
sentences.cn: 如果按8个数量级来看，延时量会显得小一些。

sentences.en: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
They worked without a break until about eight in the evening.
sentences.cn: 他们一刻不停地干到晚上8点钟左右。

sentences.en: To date we have spent eight thousand pounds between us.
sentences.cn: 迄今我们总共已经花掉了8,000英镑。

sentences.en: Twenty eight percent of the federal budget is spent on defense.

words.tran_cn: 第十八的，第十八个的；十八分之一的
第八十的；八十分之一的
八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

phrases.tran_cn: 八号球；球形全向传声器
八国集团（指美、德、英、法、意、加、日、俄八国组成的国际经济同盟）
八仙（中国传统神化人物）
